title: ci(nix): avoid libstdc++/nix ABI collisions; add local CI gate

decisions_summary.description: Diagnose ABI collision between pip wheels (numpy/torch) and nix binary
Create nix-clean wrapper pattern for clean nix execution
Add ci-local.sh as canonical local gate
Multiple fix iterations on dynamic-linker contamination
Document the wrapper in PR body and verify flake check

notes: Multi-session PR with 5 commits over ~10 hours wall time. Significant debugging of ABI issues. Commits show oscillation pattern (fix, improve, implement differently).

title: chore(version): single-source __version__ + guardrail test

decisions_summary.description: Tighten exception handling from generic Exception to PackageNotFoundError
Add test_versioning.py guardrail to prevent version drift

notes: Small focused PR. Single commit, 2 files changed. Clear scope from start.

title: fix(nix): source package version from pyproject.toml

decisions_summary.description: Use builtins.fromTOML to extract version dynamically
Verify with nix eval that version syncs correctly

notes: Very small PR - 1 file, 5 additions, 1 deletion. Single commit. Fixes #79.

title: chore(release): v1.9.2
notes: Standard release PR - version bump + changelog. Mechanical work.

title: deps: rollup safe dependency updates

decisions_summary.description: Group multiple dependabot PRs into single rollup
Verify combined updates don't break build
Write consolidated PR description listing superseded PRs

notes: Rollup of 7 dependabot PRs. Low decision overhead but some coordination work.

title: chore(release): v1.9.1
notes: Standard release PR - version bump + changelog.

title: ci(deps): bump actions/cache from 4 to 5

decisions_summary.description: Accept major version bump after review

notes: Dependabot PR - minimal human intervention, just merge decision.
